title: (Wed Early Bird) MAJOR Update On Amy’s Friend Stolen Truck + A Famous Person Left Us A Voicemail  + Never Gonna Get It!
itunes:title: (Wed Early Bird) MAJOR Update On Amy’s Friend Stolen Truck + A Famous Person Left Us A Voicemail  + Never Gonna Get It!
description:
Amy shares an important update on her friend’s truck that got stolen. She feels like she was responsible and now there’s a new development in the story. We can’t believe the person who left us a voicemail! Inside of Never Gonna Get It, the question is: It takes six minutes to make one of these, which may sound like a long time -- until you know it took 27 hours back when they were introduced back in 1953. What are they?

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
Amy shares an important update on her friend’s truck that got stolen. She feels like she was responsible and now there’s a new development in the story. We can’t believe the person who left us a voicemail! Inside of Never Gonna Get It, the question is: It takes six minutes to make one of these, which may sound like a long time -- until you know it took 27 hours back when they were introduced back in 1953. What are they?

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
